DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study : To evaluate pharmacokinetics ( PK ) property BIIB074 administer single oral dose healthy Japanese Caucasian participant ; To evaluate PK property BIIB074 administer repeated oral dos healthy Japanese participant . The secondary objective study assess safety tolerability BIIB074 administer single oral dose ( Japanese Caucasian participant ) repeat oral dos ( Japanese participant ) .
DOC.brief_title: PK Safety Study BIIB074 Healthy Japanese Caucasian Participants
DOC.criteria: Key Japanese Caucasian . Japanese participant must bear Japan , biological parent grandparent must Japanese origin . Must body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 , inclusive . Key Previous exposure BIIB074 , exception Japanese participant complete Part 1 . Use oral , injected , implanted hormonal method contraception contain ethinyl estradiol within 28 day Day 1 unwillingness refrain product use study participation . NOTE : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
